Kato, 2018: Clouds and the Earth's Radiant Energy System (CERES) Energy Balanced and Filled (EBAF) Top-of-Atmosphere (TOA) Edition-4.0 Data Produ ct. Journal of Climate, Volume 31, Issue 2 (January 2018) pp. 895-918. doi: 10.1175/JCLI-D-17-0208.1
title: CERES prepared for obs4MIPs (ODS-v2.1.0)
originData_notes: This space is for additional info relevant to how the retrieved data will be made obs4MIPs compliant.
